creator: andrea.pagano@poste.it
text:
When I use fo:inline or fo:wrapper to change font characteristics, in example 
to use a bold font in a 
sentence contained in the <fo:block text-align="justify"> tag , it is rendered 
without justify properties and 
addition whitespace are generated.

Regards,
Andrea Pagano
Rome, Italy

I cannot reproduce the problem, it works fine in FOP 0.20.4. Provide example of
the bug, please.
creator: oleg@tkachenko.com
gadams@apache.org
text: batch transition to closed remaining pre-FOP1.0 resolved bugs
